dmca.title: [TP-C465647G] Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Monday, August 14, 2006 11:05 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C465647G] Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP Subject: [TP-C465647G] Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C465647G] Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP Reference: [TP-C465647G] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP Added by system at Monday, Aug 14 2006 03:42 pm X-MailFrom: jill@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.181] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Mon Aug 14 15:41:20 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 14 Aug 2006 15:41:19 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from jill@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GCjFP-00056v-4n for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Mon, 14 Aug 2006 15:41:19 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 14 Aug 2006 15:41:18 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from jill@netenforcers.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GCjFO-0006RI-Dp; Mon, 14 Aug 2006 15:41:18 -0500 Received: from [69.25.50.217] (helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from jill@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GCjFN-00056i-Pv; Mon, 14 Aug 2006 15:41:17 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6BFE1.FD84CF52"; type="multipart/alternative" Subject: Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP Date: Mon, 14 Aug 2006 16:41:16 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder/ ISP Thread-Index: Aca/4fycAoUFcXGyQrWGWM/EpVlGFw== From: "Jill Badlotto" To: , Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 69.25.50.217 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of netenforcers.com) client-ip=69.25.50.217; envelope-from=jill@netenforcers.com; helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Aug 2006 20:41:18.0588 (UTC) FILETIME=[FE8DA3C0:01C6BFE1] Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.111 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of netenforcers.com) client-ip=70.87.6.111; envelope-from=jill@netenforcers.com; helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) The below is a Cease and Desist letter referencing your client Powersellernyc.com and our client Sony with specific respects to Camcorder. Your client continues the use the copyrighted images/text and/or trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder. The notice was originally sent to your client on 08/01/06. As of this time the website was rechecked and the infringing material has not been removed in its entirety. We are informing you in an attempt to get this resolved. Please assist us in having this material removed from your clients' website. ________________________________ Phoenix Office: Ellis & Venable 101 N. First Avenue, Suite 1875 Phoenix, Arizona 85003 voice: (602) 631-9393 fax: (602) 631-9796 8/1/2006 7006 0810 0000 2690 3929 VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. George Poletes 1333 Stemmons Pwy.Ste. 110 Dallas,TX75207 Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials Dear Designated Agent: We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc., to contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, powersellernyc.com, at the URL www.powersellernyc.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by powersellernyc.com are listed below this paragraph. http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16840--Sony-Sony-DCR-DVD105-Mini-DVD-Digital-Camcorder-.html http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-16838--Sony-Sony-DCR-HC96-Mini-DV-Digital-Camcorder-.html http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-15087--Sony-DCR-HC90-MINIDV-HANDYCAM-CAMCORDER-.html http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-15020--Sony-Handycam-HDR-HC1-Mini-DV-Digital-Camcorder-.html http://www.powersellernyc.com/product-14484--Sony-DCR-HC42E-PAL-Mini-DV-Digital-Handycam-.html Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 501-646-6242, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communications should be in writing. However, if you wish to speak with Net Enforcers directly, you may contact them at 501-646-6242. Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 8/11/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and proceed accordingly. Sincerely, Ellis & Venable Lance C. Venable Attorney at Law LCV/roc MIME element (text/html) Phoenix Office:
The below is a Cease and Desist letter referencing your client Powersellernyc.com and our client Sony with specific respects to Camcorder. Your client continues the use the copyrighted images/text and/or trademarked logos of Sony Camcorder. The notice was originally sent to your client on 08/01/06. As of this time the website was rechecked and the infringing material has not been removed in its entirety. We are informing you in an attempt to get this resolved. Please assist us in having this material removed from your clients’ website.

Phoenix Office:
